segments.text: Happy birthday , Ms . Lin . Here is a present for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thank you ! It's very kind of you . Ah , it is a porcelain vase .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is lovely . I have been expecting something like this for a long time . Thanks ever so much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am glad you like it .
segments.speaker: S1
